name: slappiz-untitled-game
description:
Genre: Turn-Based, Roguelike, Dungeon Crawler

This playable version takes about 5-15 minutes to play through but can be played multiple times with limited variations.

After testing the game please leave feedback in this Google Form.

FYI : The game doesn't have an in game tutorial at this state so please read the info below.

  • Full keyboard and gamepad support
  • Movement and menu navigation with WASD (keyboard) or Left Stick (gamepad).
  • Confirm menu selection is ENTER (keyboard) or Button South (gamepad).
  • Attacking and interacting with objects in game is done by moving towards the adjacent object,
  • Abilities can be toggled with 1234 (keyboard) or Button North, East, South and West (gamepad).
  • To aim and use an ability use the movement keys. Using the movement key towards already set direction will trigger the ability.
  • Abilities have charges (yellow text on ability icon) and can be depleted.

Note: The main goal with this test is to gather feedback on the general design of the game. All artwork and menus are placeholders and shouldn't be the main focus of the feedback.
